Function to transform data from

Function to transform data from get_major_ions to Stiff diagram

transform_stiff_data(df, Mg = "Magnesium, dissolved",
  Ca = "Calcium, dissolved", Na = "Sodium, dissolved",
  K = "Potassium, dissolved", Cl = "Chloride, total",
  SO4 = "Sulfate, total", Alk = "Alkalinity, total (lab)",
  name = "location_id", date = "sample_date", TDS = NULL, units = NULL)

Arguments

df

data frame of groundwater data from get_major_ions

Mg

Magnesium

Ca

Calcium

Na

Sodium,

K

Potassium

Cl

Chloride

SO4

Sulfate

name

location_id

date

sample_date

TDS

Total Dissolved Solids

units

Units of data

HCO3

Alkalinity

  • Arguments
